item.text: Be imitators of me, just as I also am of Christ.
I praise you because you remember me in everything and maintain the traditions just as I passed them on to you.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> is the <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> of a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> is the <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="3956" class="">Any</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> who <st data-num="4336" class="">prays</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4395" class="">prophesies</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">covered</st> <st data-num="2617" class="">disgraces</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">any</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> who <st data-num="4336" class="">prays</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4395" class="">prophesies</st> with her <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> <st data-num="177" class="">uncovered</st> <st data-num="2617" class="">disgraces</st> her <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="846">same thing</st> as having a <st data-num="3587">shaved head</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2619" class="">cover</st> her <st data-num="2619" class="">head</st>, she should <st data-num="2751" class="">cut off</st> her <st data-num="2751" class="">hair</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> it is <st data-num="150" class="">disgraceful</st> for a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> to have her <st data-num="2751">hair cut off</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> her <st data-num="3587">head shaved</st>, she should <st data-num="2619" class="">cover</st> her <st data-num="2619" class="">head</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="3784" class="">should</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2619" class="">have</st> his <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> <st data-num="2619" class="">covered</st>, since he <st data-num="5225">is</st> the <st data-num="1504" class="">image</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of the <st data-num="435" class="">man</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Neither</st> was <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="2936" class="">created</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">for the sake of</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st>.

<st data-num="1223" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778">this reason</st> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="3784" class="">should</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> a symbol of <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> her <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st>, <st data-num="1223">because of</st> the <st data-num="32">angels</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="4133">In any case</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> is <st data-num="3777">not</st> <st data-num="5565" class="">independent</st> of <st data-num="435" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> is <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="5565" class="">independent</st> of <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5618">just as</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> came <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> comes <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st> come <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="2919" class="">Judge</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">yourselves:</st> <st data-num="1510">Is</st> it <st data-num="4241" class="">proper</st> for a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> to <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> with her head <st data-num="177" class="">uncovered</st>?

Does <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5449" class="">nature</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">itself</st> <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="2863">has long hair</st>, it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="819" class="">disgrace</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="2863">has long hair</st>, it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>? <st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> her <st data-num="2864" class="">hair</st> is <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="473" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="4018" class="">covering</st>.<n id="1" />
If anyone intends to quarrel about this, we have no other practice, nor do the churches of God.
Now in giving the following instruction I do not praise you, because you come together not for the better but for the worse.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> in the <st data-num="4413">first place</st>, when <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4905">come together</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> I <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> there <st data-num="5225" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4978" class="">divisions</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3313" class="">in part</st> I <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> it.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> there <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="2532">in fact</st> <st data-num="1510">be</st> <st data-num="139" class="">divisions</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> those <st data-num="1722" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> who are <st data-num="1384" class="">approved</st> may <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5318" class="">evident</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Now</st> when <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4905">come together</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="846">same place</st>, you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> really <st data-num="2068">eating</st> the <st data-num="2960">Lord’s</st> <st data-num="5315" class="">Supper</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">when</st> it is time to <st data-num="2068">eat</st>, <st data-num="1538" class="">everyone</st> <st data-num="4301">proceeds with</st> <st data-num="2398" class="">his own</st> <st data-num="1173" class="">supper</st>. <st data-num="3739">One</st> is <st data-num="3983" class="">hungry</st> <st data-num="1161">and</st> <st data-num="3739">another</st> <st data-num="3184">becomes drunk</st>.

Do you not have houses so that you can eat and drink? Or are you trying to show contempt for the church of God by shaming those who have nothing? What should I say to you? Should I praise you? I will not praise you for this!
For I received from the Lord what I also passed on to you, that the Lord Jesus on the night in which he was betrayed took bread,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> after he had <st data-num="2168">given thanks</st> he <st data-num="2806" class="">broke</st> it <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>, which is <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="4160" class="">Do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="364" class="">remembrance</st> of <st data-num="1699" class="">me</st>.”

<st data-num="5615">In the same way</st>, he <st data-num="2532">also</st> took the <st data-num="4221" class="">cup</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> <st data-num="1172" class="">supper</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="4221" class="">cup</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> <st data-num="1242" class="">covenant</st> <st data-num="1722">in</st> <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>. <st data-num="4160" class="">Do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="3740">every time</st> you <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> it, <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="364" class="">remembrance</st> of <st data-num="1699" class="">me</st>.”
For every time you eat this bread and drink the cup, you proclaim the Lord’s death until he comes.
For this reason, whoever eats the bread or drinks the cup of the Lord in an unworthy manner will be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord.

A <st data-num="444" class="">person</st> should <st data-num="1381" class="">examine</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> first,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3779">in this way</st><n id="2" /> let him <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> the <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="4221" class="">cup</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the one who <st data-num="2068" class="">eats</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drinks</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">without</st> <st data-num="1252">careful regard</st><n id="1" /> for the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">eats</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drinks</st> <st data-num="2917" class="">judgment</st> against <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>.

<st data-num="1223 3778">That is why</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="772" class="">weak</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="732" class="">sick</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2425">quite a few</st> are <st data-num="2837" class="">dead</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> we <st data-num="1252" class="">examined</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">ourselves</st>, we would <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="2919" class="">judged</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when we are <st data-num="2919" class="">judged</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, we are <st data-num="3811" class="">disciplined</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> we may <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="2632" class="">condemned</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.

<st data-num="5620">So then</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> when you <st data-num="4905">come together</st> to <st data-num="2068">eat</st>, <st data-num="1551">wait for</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st>.
If anyone is hungry, let him eat at home, so that when you assemble it does not lead to judgment. I will give directions about other matters when I come.
